name: Pac-Man: Breakout
description:
Description -

This was a game I made with some classmates back in mid-2017 for a final project in high-school). This game is still enjoyable, so leave feedback if you want! The game design class in question was alright, but it didn't really teach me anything, except that I'm good at crunch time, and pulling a lot of the weight.

You are Pac-Man, the world was quickly and without warning enveloped in darkness and has everyone in the world under something's control. You've found the source of the terror, but that's where your memory stops. You wake up and you've suddenly found yourself in a strange place. It's almost like your home, but something's different, there's new items and... things are turning red..?  Will you be able to breakout the world from the darkness?

Controls - 

WASD - Move

Collect all white pellets to move on to the next stage! A green UFO will come down and take you to the next level. Don't trust the red one.

- POWERUPS: short period of time -

Yellow Pellet - Classic Pac-Man powerup, able to eat ghosts are is invincible 

Cherry - Speed up

Plum - Makes a clone of yourself at spawn and does the opposite of what you do, can kill ghosts

Gun - Space to shoot

*BAD BUGS*

Don't hit continue on the menu, it will crash the game

External Assets Credits -

Ending song : Majesty - Disasterpeace https://music.disasterpeace.com/track/majesty

Normal Level and Boss Music: Unknown (If you know the song/artist let me know so I can credit!)

Boss sprite: Legend of Zelda
